article.title: Portland U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Portland U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Portland Office Contact Information

Portland,OR U.S. Export Assistance Center

One World Trade Center
121 SW Salmon St., Suite 242
Portland, OR 97204
Phone: 503-326-3001
Fax: 503-326-6351
Email:scott.goddin@trade.gov
Website:http://www.export.gov/oregon/

Portland Staff

Scott Goddin, Director
Phone: 503-326-5156
Fax: 503-326-6351
Email:scott.goddin@trade.gov

Industries:Aerospace– Aircraft & Equipment, Airport/Ground Support, Aviation Services,Information and Communications Technologies- Computers/Peripherals, Computer Software & Applications, Computer Services, Telecommunications Eq.& Services, Audio-Visual Equipment & Technologies, Electronics Industry Prod/Test Eq., Electronic Components, E-Commerce, Information Services;Energy-Electrical Power Systems, Renewable Energy Eq., Smart Grid, Building Controls, Air Conditioning/Refrigeration Eq., Oil/Gas Field Machinery, Oil/Gas/Mineral Prod/Explor Serv;Marine Products & Technologies: Commercial Vessel/Eq., Commercial Fishing Eq., Pleasure Boats/Accessories, Port/Shipbuilding Eq, Marine Fisheries Products (Seafood),Publishing & Media -Films/Videos;Other- Plastics Materials/Resins, Plastics Production Machinery; Paints & Coatings, Composite Products

Allan Christian, Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 503-326-5450
Fax: 503-326-6351
Email:allan.christian@trade.gov

Industries:Agribusiness- Agricultural Chemicals, Agricultural Machinery & Eq., Agricultural Services, Lawn/Garden Eq.;Food Processing/Packaging -Foods – Processed, Alcoholic Beverages, Nutritional Supplements, Packaging Eq., Pet Foods/Products, Hotel/Restaurant Eq;Healthcare Technologies- Medical Eq., Health Care Services, Dental Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Biotechnology, Veterinary Medicine Eq./Supplies, Laboratory & Analytical Equipment;General Consumer Goods- Artwork, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Furniture, Giftware, Jewelry, Musical Instruments, Photographic Eq., Toys/Games,Other- Materials Handling Machinery,

Kellie Holloway, Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 503-326-3002
Fax: 503-326-6351
Email:kellie.holloway@trade.gov

Industries:Automotive & Ground Transportation- Automobile/Light Truck/Vans, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Electric Vehicles & Infrastructure, Transportation Serv. (other than Aviation), Trucks/Trailers/Buses, Railroad Eq.;Security/Safety Eq/Defense Industry Eq.,Manufacturing Industries- Iron/Steel, Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Non-Ferrous Metals, Mining Equipment, Process Controls - Industrial, Pumps/Valves/Compressors, Tools - Hand/Power, General Industrial Eq./Supplies,Finance- Accounting Services, Investment Services, Financial Services, Insurance,Other -Used/Reconditioned Eq.

Jennifer Woods, Senior International Trade Specialist

Phone: 503-326-5290
Fax: 503-326-6351
Email:jennifer.woods@trade.gov
Industries: Architectural/Constr./Engineering Equipment & Services, Building Products, Wood & Wood Products, Construction Eq., Forestry/Woodworking Machinery,Education/Training Services;Travel/Tourism Services;Environmental Technologies -Pollution Control Eq., Water Resources Eq./Services;Textiles, Apparel & Sporting Goods– Outdoor Recreation Equipment (Dual Use), Textile Fabrics, Textile Machinery/Eq., Apparel, Footwear,Franchising; Other -Management Consulting Services, General Services, Industrial Chemicals, Chemical Production Machinery

Sandra Edwards, Regional Manager, Export Solutions Group

U.S. Small Business Administration, Office of International Trade

U.S. Export Assistance Center, 2001 6th Avenue, Suite 2610, Seattle, WA 98121

Email:Sandra.Edwards@sba.gov

Phone: 206-553-5615 extension 228| Fax: 202-292-3610

Covering: Washington, Oregon, Idaho and Alaska

Export Finance:Export Finance Specialist providing information on methods of payment, risk mitigation; export financing methods; SBA export loans and applications.

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 ​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Portland U.S. Export Assistance Center.
